moTa: The Maserati Ghibli is available as a sedan. The 2018 Ghibli starts at $73,050 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,250. It gets EPA-estimated 19 MPG combined. The Maserati Ghibli competes against models like the Subaru Legacy, Chrysler 300, and Toyota Camry. The Ghibli is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. and small families Small Family vehicles include mid-size and larger sedans, hatchbacks, wagons, SUVs and minivans with four doors and five seats. .

The Maserati GranTurismo is available as a convertible and coupe. The 2018 GranTurismo starts at $132,975 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,800. It gets EPA-estimated 15-16 MPG combined. The Maserati GranTurismo competes against models like the Jaguar F-TYPE, Acura NSX, and Nissan GT-R. The GranTurismo is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs. The Maserati Quattroporte is available as a sedan and coupe. The 2018 Quattroporte starts at $105,600 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,800. It gets EPA-estimated 17-18 MPG combined. The Maserati Quattroporte competes against models like the Audi S8, Mercedes-Benz AMG E 63, and BMW M5. The Maserati Levante is available as a SUV. The 2018 Levante starts at $74,050 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,250. It gets EPA-estimated 16 MPG combined. The Maserati Levante competes against models like the Dodge Durango, Subaru Outback, and Kia Sportage.
